oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Study of the donor properties of some cyclic tellurides and 4,5-(1,8-bis(thiomethyl)naphthalene)-1,3-dithiole-2-thione
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: KUMAR, SK
KHANNA, PK
SINGH, HB
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: molecular-structure
charge-transfer
complexes
acceptor
crystal
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Some cyclic tellurides, namely, 1-telluracyclopentane, 1-telluracyclohexane, 3,4-benzo-l-telluracyclopentane and 3,5-naphtho-1-telluracyclohexane have been studied as donors towards 2,3-dichloro-5,6-dicyano- 1,4-benzoquinone (DDQ). The donor behaviour of 4-5-{1,8-bis(thiomethyl) naphthalene}- 1,3-dithiole-2-thione towards tetracyano-p- quinodimethane (TCNQ) has also been investigated. IR, UV and ESR data suggest that the complexes have significant ionic character and are not molecular in nature.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: INDIAN JOURNAL OF CHEMISTRY SECTION A-INORGANIC BIO-INORGANIC PHYSICAL THEORETICAL & ANALYTICAL CHEMISTRY,30(8)720-721
